entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
